comment:
* Contains information about a {@link TvInputService.Session} that is currently tuned to a channel
 * or pass-through input.
 * @hide

variables.name: APP_TAG_SELF
variables.comment:
* App tag for {@link #getAppTag()}: the corresponding application of the channel is the same as * the caller. *

{@link #getAppType()} returns {@link #APP_TYPE_SELF} if and only if the app tag is * {@link #APP_TAG_SELF}.

variables.name: APP_TYPE_SELF
variables.comment:
* App tag for {@link #getAppType()}: the corresponding application of the channel is the same * as the caller. *

{@link #getAppType()} returns {@link #APP_TYPE_SELF} if and only if the app tag is * {@link #APP_TAG_SELF}.

variables.name: APP_TYPE_SYSTEM
variables.comment:
* App tag for {@link #getAppType()}: the corresponding app of the channel is a system
     * application.

variables.name: APP_TYPE_NON_SYSTEM
variables.comment:
* App tag for {@link #getAppType()}: the corresponding app of the channel is not a system
     * application.

methods.name: public String getInputId()
methods.comment: * Returns the TV input ID of the channel.

methods.name: public Uri getChannelUri()
methods.comment:
* Returns the channel URI of the channel. *

Returns {@code null} if it's a passthrough input or the permission is not granted.

methods.name: public boolean isRecordingSession()
methods.comment:
* Returns {@code true} if the channel session is a recording session.
     * @see TvInputService.RecordingSession

methods.name: public boolean isVisible()
methods.comment:
* Returns {@code true} if the corresponding session is visible. *

The system checks whether the {@link Surface} of the session is {@code null} or not. When * it becomes invisible, the surface is destroyed and set to null. * @see TvInputService.Session#onSetSurface(Surface) * @see android.view.SurfaceView#notifySurfaceDestroyed

methods.name: public boolean isMainSession()
methods.comment:
* Returns {@code true} if the corresponding session is set as main session.
     * @see TvView#setMain
     * @see TvInputService.Session#onSetMain

methods.name: public int getAppTag()
methods.comment:
* Returns the app tag. *

App tag is used to differentiate one app from another. * {@link #APP_TAG_SELF} is for current app.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
